content: into first stitch single_crochet flo 1x into each stitch until you reach the chain 2 space single_crochet 2x into chain space chain 2 single_crochet 2x into chain space single_crochet flo 1x in each stitch until you reach the last stitch single_crochet 2x into last stitch row 5 chain 2 or chainless double_crochet double_crochet into the first st double_crochet 1x into each stitch until you hit the chain 2 space double_crochet 2x into chain 2 space chain 2 double_crochet 2x into chain 2 space double_crochet 1x into each stitch until you reach the last stitch double_crochet 2x into last stitch row 6 chain 2 or chainless double_crochet double_crochet into the first stitch *fpdc into the next stitch bpdc into the following stitch* repeat from * until you have one stitch before the chain space fpdc around that stitch double_crochet 2x into chain space chain 2 double_crochet 2x into chain space *fpdc into the next stitch fpdc into the following stitch* repeat from * until you have 2 stitches remaining fpdc into the next stitch double_crochet 2x into last stitch row 7 chain 2 or chainless double_crochet double_crochet into the first stitch *bpdc into the next stitch fpdc into the following stitch* repeat from * until you reach the chain space double_crochet 2x into chain space chain 2 double_crochet 2x into chain space *fpdc into the next stitch bpdc into the following stitch* repeat from * until you have1 stitch remaining double_crochet 2x into last stitch row 8 chain 1 does not count as a stitch half_double_crochet 2x into first stitch half_double_crochet 1x in each stitch until you get to the chain 2 space half_double_crochet 2x into chain space chain 2 half_double_crochet 2x into chain space half_double_crochet 1x in each stitch until the last stitch remains half_double_crochet 2x in last stitch row 9 chain 1 does not count as a stitch half_double_crochet 2x into first stitch half_double_crochet in the third loop 1x in each stitch until you reach the chain 2 space half_double_crochet 2x into chain space chain 2 half_double_crochet 2x into chain space half_double_crochet 1x in the third loop of each stitch until you reach the last stitch half_double_crochet 2x into last stitch row 10 chain 3 or chainless double_crochet and then chain ex-puff into first stitch chain 1 skip st *ex-puff into next st chain 1 skip st* repeat from * until you reach the chain 2 space ex-puff into chain space chain 3 ex-puff into chain 2 space ch1 skip 1 stitch *ex-puff into next st chain 1 skip st* repeat from * until you reach the last stitch ex-puff into the last stitch ch1 double_crochet into the last stitch row 11 chain 3 or chainless double_crochet and then chain ex-puff into first chain space chain 1 skip stitch *ex-puff into chain 1 space chain 1 skip st* repeat from * until you reach the chain 3 space ex-puff 4 into chain 3 space chain 3 ex-puff into chain 3 space chain 1 skip stitch *ex-puff into chain 1
